meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Vince Brennan Gail Bock Gareth Jones Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2616.

td.p: Vince Brennan, a lighting sales representative from Kennett Square, Pennsylvania
Gail Bock, an appraiser from Racine, Wisconsin
Gareth Jones, a real estate appraiser from Visalia, California (whose 4-day cash winnings total $27,796)

tr.td: THE BIBLE
LAS VEGAS
SPORTS WEIGHTS & MEASURES
THE INSECT WORLD
FURNITURE
PROVERBS

Triple Stumper

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_6_3', 'clue_DJ_6_3_stuck', '(Gareth: Who is Donna Summers?)
(Alex: Yes... no.)
(Judges: [Offstage] No!)
(Alex: We all jumped in at the same moment there. Gail or Vince?)
[Beep]
(Alex: Oh, I thought you might have gotten it from that one. Gareth said, "Donna Summers", but her name is [*], no "S".)

Donna Summer

Gareth
Triple Stumper
')

Harpo Marx')

Vince

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
